titleStmt.title: A box of spikenard: or A little manual of sacramental instruction and devotion especially, helpful to the people of God, at and about the time of receiving the Lords Supper. With some other formes expedient for some peculiar occasions. The third edition, by Thomas Walmestry, Dean of Worcester.
titleStmt.author: Warmstry, Thomas, 1610-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T. Mabb, for William Sheares, at the Bible in Bedford street,

notesStmt.note: "A cleare, and shore catechisme for those that are to receive the sacrament of the Lords supper" has caption title and separate register and pagination at the beginning of the second numbered sequence (B1r).
"The explanation of the frontispiece" in verse and a metalcut illustration precede the titlepage.
Imprint date from Wing; DNB gives 1664 as first date of publication.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
